name: Excuse Me, Pardon Me
description:
You're at a party, though you don't really want to stay.  But you end up in conversations with a bunch of people! 

Construct something to say that will get your conversation partner to leave you alone.  Try to get through the gauntlet of party goers to the blissful escape of home. 

Press Escape to return to the Main Menu.  Beat the game to unlock Endless Mode!

There are still some tweaks we planned in the original design that we will try to implement before the fall Slow Jam showcase.  Namely:

  • A planned mechanic for the jam theme: "One More Time"
  • Progressively weirder characters and backgrounds
  • Sound effects

Keep an eye out for more updates!

Submission for the PIGSquad "3-Button 3-Color" Summer Slow Jam , July 2019

Credits

Mike Cavataio - Art

Ginger Clarke - Narrative

Jeff Cline - Music/SFX

Jared Farkas - Code

Zoe Landon - UI Design

Tim Volpe - Code
